overview: Base CSS for a healthcare digital experience frontend defining design tokens, layout utilities, typography, accessibility helpers, and responsive grid/flex systems. Establishes consistent spacing, color, and component structure for Playwright visual and functional tests.
interactions: Skip link focus state for keyboard navigation
Dark/light theme switching via data-theme attribute
Hover and active color transitions for primary/secondary elements
data_flow: CSS variables cascade from :root to components
Theme toggling updates color and background tokens
Grid and flex utilities control content distribution
Accessibility classes modify visibility based on focus state
accessibility: Color contrast maintained via design tokens
analytics: Potential hooks for theme toggle events
Toast visibility or error banner display metrics
test_ideas: Verify skip-link becomes visible on keyboard focus
Validate dark theme color tokens apply correctly
Check responsive grid column counts at breakpoints
Ensure container padding adjusts per viewport size
Confirm back-to-top button fixed positioning and visibility
Test accessibility contrast ratios for primary and secondary colors
Validate toast-container stacking and z-index layering
